abilities_mid.desc: ⬲ __Trigger__ A goblin ally ends a move action adjacent to the warrior. __Effect__ The goblin warrior Steps.

abilities_bot.name: Big Swing
abilities_bot.desc: ⬺  The stone giant makes a greatclub <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>Strike<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>. The target is Pushed up to 10 feet on a hit or up to 20 feet on a critical hit. If the target collides with a solid object or lands on the ground, it takes bludgeoning damage as though it had fallen the distance it moved.

abilities_top.name: Grave Wrath
abilities_top.desc: (<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>magical<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>); __Requirements__ Agera is hit by a creature adjacent to her Effect The target must make a DC 27 Fortitude save or be pushed 15 feet away from Agera and is <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>slowed|slowed<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK> until the end if it's next turn.  __Effect__

abilities_bot.name: Wrathfire Curse
abilities_bot.desc: (<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>magical<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>);  Enemites within 10 feet of Agera must make a Fortitude save DC 23 or suffer 3d6+10 (3d6+10) mental damage, and their next attack will be made againsts an ally in range. On save, target suffers half damage.

attacks.name: Ranged
attacks.desc: ⬻ unhinging ray +21 (<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>mental<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>, <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>magical<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>, <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>range 20<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>); __Damage__ 2d10+11 (2d10+11) mental damage and the target is pushed 10 feet.

spellcasting.name: Spells

abilities_bot.name: Bloodcurdling Screech
abilities_bot.desc:
⬻ (<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>auditory<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>, <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>emotion<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>, <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>fear<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>, <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>mental<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>);  The primal owlbear unleashes a loud screech that terrifies its prey. Each creature in an 80-foot emanation must attempt a DC 28 Will save. Regardless of the result, creatures are temporarily immune for 1 minute.
__Critical Success__ The creature is unaffected.
__Success__ The creature is <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>rules/conditions.md#Frightened|frightened 1<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>.
__Failure__ The creature is <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>rules/conditions.md#Frightened|frightened 2<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>.
__Critical Failure__ The creature is <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>rules/conditions.md#Fleeing|fleeing<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK> for 1 round and <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>rules/conditions.md#Frightened|frightened 3<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>.

abilities_bot.name: Gnaw
abilities_bot.desc:
⬻ __Requirements__ The primal owlbear has a creature <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>rules/conditions.md#Grabbed|grabbed<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK> with its talons.  __Effect__  The owlbear attempts to disembowel the creature with a beak <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>Strike<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>. If the <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>Strike<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK> hits, the target must attempt a DC 30 Will save.
__Critical Success__ The target is unaffected.
__Success__ The target is <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>rules/conditions.md#Sickened|sickened 1<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>.
__Failure__ The target is <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>rules/conditions.md#Sickened|sickened 1<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK> and <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>rules/conditions.md#Slowed|slowed 1<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK> as long as it remains <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>rules/conditions.md#Sickened|sickened<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>.

abilities_bot.name: Screeching Advance
abilities_bot.desc: ⬺ (<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>auditory<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>, <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>emotion<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>, <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>fear<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>, <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>mental<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>);  The primal owlbear makes a Bloodcurdling Screech and <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>Stride|Strides<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK> twice. All creatures within 80 feet of the owlbear at any point during this movement are subjected to the effects of Bloodcurdling Screech.

abilities_bot.name: Mind Harrier
abilities_bot.desc:
`pf2:2` (Enchantment, Mental, Psychic, Incapacitation); **Requirements**: Targets one creature within 60 feet and visible to the Foulspawn Mockery. The Mockery distorts reality for a moment, implanting a psychic seed in the mind of its foe. Those separated from allies find the seed blooms into agonizing pain. The target must attempt a Will save.
- **Critical Success**: The target is unaffected.
- **Success**: The target takes 2d6+6 mental damage.
- **Failure**: The target takes 2d6+6 mental damage and is cursed. Until the end of its next turn, if it ends its turn not adjacent to any ally, it takes 10 mental damage and becomes clumsy 1 for 1 round.
- **Critical Failure**: As failure, and the target also gains persistent mental damage (1d10). The persistent damage ends automatically when the target ends its turn adjacent to an ally or succeeds at a DC 25 Will save at the end of its turn.

abilities_bot.name: Maddening Burst
abilities_bot.desc:
`pf2:3` (Enchantment, Mental, Psychic, Emotion); **Frequency**: Recharge 5–6 on 1d6 With a sudden pulse of mind-warping thought, the Mockery floods the minds of nearby foes with hallucinations and chaotic voices that disrupt clarity and decision-making. All enemies within 10 feet of the target location must attempt a Will save.
- **Critical Success**: The creature is unaffected.
- **Success**: The creature takes half damage.
- **Failure**: The creature takes 2d6+6 mental damage and is stupefied 2 for 1 round.
- **Critical Failure**: The creature takes full damage, is stupefied 2 for 1 minute, and must succeed at a DC 5 flat check to cast spells or activate abilities with a verbal component while affected.

abilities_bot.name: Dagger Dance
abilities_bot.desc: `pf2:3` (<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>move<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>); The mangler uses dagger attacks three times and can Step up2 squares after each attack.

attacks.name: Melee
attacks.desc: ⬻ dagger +18 (<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>agile|Agile<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>, <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>finesse|Finesse<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>, <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>thrown|Thrown 10ft.<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>, <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>versatile|Versatile S<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>); __Damage__ 2d4+5 (2d4+5) piercing plus 1d6 (1d6) persistent bleed

- **Success**: The target takes 2d6+6 mental damage.
- **Failure**: The target takes 2d6+6 mental damage and is cursed. Until the end of its next turn, if it ends its turn not adjacent to any ally, it takes 10 mental damage and becomes clumsy 1 for 1 round.
- **Critical Failure**: As failure, and the target also gains persistent mental damage (1d10). The persistent damage ends automatically when the target ends its turn adjacent to an ally or succeeds at a DC 25 Will save at the end of its turn.

abilities_mid.name: Stench
abilities_mid.desc: (aura, olfactory) 30 feet, DC 28 – A creature that enters the aura or starts its turn there must succeed at a Fortitude save or become <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>Sickened 1<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>. On a failure, the creature takes a –1 status penalty to all checks and DCs until it uses an action to retch. A creature that succeeds isn't affected by any xulgath's stench for 1 minute.

abilities_mid.name: Stench
abilities_mid.desc: (aura, olfactory) 30 feet, DC 30 – A creature that enters the aura or starts its turn there must succeed at a Fortitude save or become <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>Sickened 1<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>.

abilities_mid.name: Hidden Movement
abilities_mid.desc: If a xulgath skulker starts its turn <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>Undetected<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK> or <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>Hidden<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>, that creature is <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>Off-Guard<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK> against its attacks until the end of the skulker’s turn.

abilities_mid.name: Mask Stench
abilities_mid.desc: The skulker masks its stench with curated herbs, suppressing the stench aura. It can resume the aura as a free action.

abilities_mid.name: Sneak Attack
abilities_mid.desc: The skulker deals an additional 1d6 precision damage to <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>Off-Guard<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK> creatures.

abilities_mid.name: Stench
abilities_mid.desc: (aura, olfactory) 30 feet, DC 33 – A creature that enters the aura or starts its turn there must succeed at a Fortitude save or become sickened.

abilities_bot.name: Weakening Strike
abilities_bot.desc: A creature hit by a xulgath leader's jaws or claw Strike is <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>Enfeebled 1<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK> (or <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>Enfeebled 2<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK> on a critical hit) for 1 round.

abilities_bot.name: Whisper of Death
abilities_bot.desc: <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>reaction<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>, <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>occult<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>, <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>mental<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>, <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>psychic<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK> — Trigger: The meenlock spawn is reduced to 0 HP. Effect: Each enemy adjacent to the meenlock takes 4d6 psychic damage (DC 28 basic Will save).

abilities_mid.name: Double Actions
abilities_mid.desc: Morrn rolls initiative twice and takes a full turn on each result. He can take two reactions per round, but only one between each of his turns.

abilities_mid.name: Insubstantial
abilities_mid.desc: Morrn takes half damage from all sources except force and positive damage. If he takes radiant damage, this trait is suppressed until the start of his next turn.

abilities_bot.name: Gladiator’s Instinct
abilities_bot.desc: __Trigger__: An enemy enters a square flanking Morrn. __Effect__: Morrn makes a melee Strike against the flanking creature. On a hit, the target is pushed 15 feet.

abilities_bot.name: Rejuvenation
abilities_bot.desc: If destroyed, Morrn reforms in 1d10 days unless his remains are sanctified with a __6th-level__ or higher __consecrate__ spell.

health.name: HP
health.desc: 250; __Negative Healing__; __Immunities__ disease, poison, precision, death effects, paralyzed, unconscious; __Resistances__ all damage 10 (except force, ghost touch, or positive)

attacks.name: Spectral Sword ◈
attacks.desc: __Melee__ +32; __Damage__ `dice: 2d10+10` 2d12+10 negative damage, and the target is pushed 5 feet. The target takes 10 persistent negative damage (__DC 30__ to end). Morrn marks the target until the end of his next turn.

abilities_mid.name: Shadow Stealth
abilities_mid.desc: The Pit Shadow can Hide in dim light or darkness even without cover or concealment.

abilities_mid.name: Phasing
abilities_mid.desc: The Pit Shadow can move through solid objects and creatures as though they were difficult terrain. It must end its turn in an unoccupied space.

abilities_bot.name: Pit Wail
abilities_bot.desc: (<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>sonic<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>) (15-foot cone), once every `dice: 1d4` 1d4 rounds; +24 vs Fortitude, `dice: 3d6` 3d6 sonic damage and pushed 10 feet on hit (20 feet and knocked prone on crit). No effect on failure.

health.name: HP

attacks.desc: ⬻ +24 (magical); __Damage__ 3d12+10 bludgeoning plus Knock Prone if adjacent to an ally

abilities_top.name: Runes of Strength
abilities_top.desc: At the start of combat, each statue has 1 rune of strength. For every additional rune of strength it has beyond the first, it deals an additional 1d12 damage on melee Strikes.

abilities_bot.name: Runic Gift ⬲
abilities_bot.desc: **Trigger** The statue is reduced to 0 HP. **Effect** It shatters, and each other Runic Statue within 30 feet gains one additional rune of strength until the end of the encounter.

abilities_top.name: Petrifying Gaze
abilities_top.desc: ⬻ (<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>arcane<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>, <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>aura<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>, <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>visual<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>) **30 feet**. At the end of each enemy’s turn within the aura, they must attempt a DC 34 Fortitude save. On a failure, the creature is <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>conditions#slowed|Slowed 1<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK> for 1 minute. On a critical failure, the creature is petrified permanently. The medusa can activate or deactivate this aura using a single action with the concentrate trait.

abilities_top.name: Biting Snakes
abilities_top.desc: `pf2:r` **Trigger** A creature ends its turn adjacent to the medusa.  **Effect** The medusa makes a snake fangs Strike.

abilities_bot.name: Focus Gaze
abilities_bot.desc: ⬻ (<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>arcane<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>, <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>concentrate<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>, <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>incapacitation<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>, <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>visual<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK> The medusa focuses their gaze on a creature within 30 feet. That creature must immediately attempt a DC 34 Fortitude save against the medusa’s petrifying gaze. If already slowed, a failure causes the creature to be permanently petrified. After attempting the save, the creature is temporarily immune until the start of the medusa’s next turn.

abilities_mid.name: Phalanx Movement
abilities_mid.desc: ⬽ __Frequency__ once per round. __Effect__ Jorag and each adjacent ally can Step as a free action, but must end adjacent to Jorag. This does not trigger reactions.

abilities_mid.name: Swift Whip
abilities_mid.desc: ⬲ __Trigger__ A creature within 10 feet uses a hostile action or makes an attack that doesn't include Jorag. __Effect__ Jorag makes a Whip Strike against the triggering creature. On a hit, the target takes normal damage and the creature takes a –2 circumstance penalty to the triggering attack. This is a <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>mental<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK> and <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>emotion<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK> effect.

abilities_top.name: Stone Defense
abilities_top.desc: The gargoyle has resistance 10 to all damage from creatures more than 25 feet away (5 squares).

abilities_mid.name: Hail of Hurled Stone
abilities_mid.desc: ⬺ __Frequency__ once per round. __Effect__ The gargoyle hurls a barrage of stones. __Area__ 10-foot burst within 50 feet. __Targets__ All creatures in the area. __Strike__ +27 vs. AC; __Damage__ 2d6+7 bludgeoning, or 2d6+12 to the creature in the center square. __Miss__ Half damage.

abilities_mid.name: Blood Tracker
abilities_mid.desc: The minotaur can smell the presence of wounded creatures. It gains a +2 circumstance bonus to Survival checks to Track creatures that are below their maximum Hit Points.

abilities_mid.name: Labyrinth Sense
abilities_mid.desc: The minotaur always knows the shortest, most direct route to the center of any maze or labyrinthine terrain.

abilities_mid.name: Powerful Charge
abilities_mid.desc: ⬺ __Requirements__ The minotaur Strides at least 10 feet in a straight line immediately before the Strike. __Effect__ The minotaur makes a horn Strike. On a hit, it deals an additional 1d8 damage and the target must succeed at a DC 32 Fortitude save or be knocked <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>prone<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>.

abilities_mid.name: Rune Effect
abilities_mid.desc: Whenever Olek uses an attack power, he chooses one of its two rune effects (conquest or resistance). He gains that effect for that use of that power.

abilities_mid.name: Stand the Ground
abilities_mid.desc: Olek is moved 5 feet less by any forced movement effects.

abilities_mid.name: Steady-Footed
abilities_mid.desc: When Olek would be knocked <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>prone<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>, he can attempt a DC 30 Reflex save to remain standing.

abilities_mid.name: Runic Font
abilities_mid.desc: If a Runic Font is active in the encounter, Olek gains one additional action per round.

abilities_mid.name: Rune of Command's Curse
abilities_mid.desc: After Olek uses **Rune of Command's Blessing**, if he rolls a natural 5 or lower on his first attack roll during a turn, he becomes <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>controlled<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK> by an external entity until the end of his next turn.

abilities_bot.name: Rune of Command’s Blessing `pf2:2` (arcane, auditory, emotion, mental)
abilities_bot.desc:
**Frequency**: Once per encounter, usable only while below 50% HP. Olek targets all enemies in a 10-foot emanation. DC 34 Will save.
**Success**: Unaffected.
**Failure**: Target is <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>controlled<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK> until the end of Olek's next turn.

**Conquest Rune**: Olek gains a +2 status bonus to attack rolls until the end of his next turn.
**Resistance Rune**: Each enemy that succeeds their save becomes <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>enfeebled 1<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK> until the end of Olek’s next turn.

abilities_bot.name: Runic Duality `pf2:r` (reaction, arcane, divine)
abilities_bot.desc: **Trigger**: A creature within Olek’s melee reach uses a manipulate, move, or attack action. **Effect**: Olek makes a Runic Warhammer Strike with one of his rune effects.
